summary: This document is a suicide watch observation log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, beginning on July 23, 2019, for an inmate with a partially redacted name and register number. It contains chronological entries documenting the inmate's behavior and location in the cell over a several-hour period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate on suicide watch, referenced by a partially redacted name and register number consistent with his incarceration details. The log documents his behavior and location in the cell.

events.title: Suicide watch initiation for Jeffrey Epstein

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: A suicide watch was initiated for Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York on July 23, 2019, at 1:40 AM.
The log contains detailed, half-hourly observations of the inmate's behavior and position (e.g., sitting on bed, standing at door) over several hours.
The inmate's name and register number are partially redacted in the form fields, but the context strongly indicates it is Jeffrey Epstein.
The document is a standard institutional suicide watch observation log, requiring staff to document observations at regular intervals.
